summary: Use this api to bind first mile tracking number
description: Use this api to bind first mile tracking number.

query.name: first_mile_tracking_number
query.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

query.name: order_list
query.description: The list of order info you want to unbind from the given first mile tracking number. You can specify up to 50 orders in this call.

query.name: order_sn
query.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

query.name: package_number
query.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order. You should't fill the field with empty string when there is't a package number.

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: message
schema.sample: All failed, please check result_list for detail
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: warning
schema.description: Indicate warning message you should take care.

schema.name: order_sn
schema.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

schema.name: package_number
schema.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order.

schema.name: order_list
schema.description: The binding result list of each order.

schema.name: order_sn
schema.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

schema.name: package_number
schema.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order.

schema.name: fail_error
schema.description: Indicate error type if one element hit error.

schema.name: fail_message
schema.sample: The status of order(order_sn: 2004239MRBBFPJ) is invalid.
schema.description: Indicate error details if one element hit error.
